suppress.notes: This appears to be a false-positive as this is only exploitable in Spring Framework 5.0.5.RELEASE which we don't use

It looks like there is no fix for the issue tomcat-embed-core-9.0.40.jar (pkg:maven/org.apache.tomcat.embed/tomcat-embed-core@9.0.40, cpe:2.3:a:apache:tomcat:9.0.40:*:*:*:*:*:*:*, cpe:2.3:a:apache_software_foundation:tomcat:9.0.40:*:*:*:*:*:*:*, cpe:2.3:a:apache_tomcat:apache_tomcat:9.0.40:*:*:*:*:*:*:*)
This is being temporarily suppressed until we can implement a solution that fixes the issues that arise from upgrading to a safe version.
